title: [Bug]: Not recognizing @Everyone inthe chat - Ubuntu 24.04 / Teams For Linux 2.0.9
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

Teams generally allows @Everyone to mention all group members. In Teams for linux it is not working like that. 

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.9

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.Type @Everyone
2.It is not recognized as a keyword.
3.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
